name: FullConfig

ChangePackageDescription.value: Change Package that will eventually contain full system config

signedGlobalXml:

        <Value AttributeID="27715ad5-b32c-46de-9819-a6f4d2916ef9">Provide the customer with important details about your product in 3 or more sentences (1500 character limit).  Use the categorization path to help you select the proper Data Standard.</Value>
